about_the_game:
Join Our Discord!

Join the Discord community to request a free alpha key and get access to the steam game for free!

Dive into a Vibrant Universe
Welcome to Terra Dentium, a solo developer's homage to classic monster battling games. Explore a pixel-art world filled with diverse and mysterious areas, each teeming with wild creatures to discover and capture. With strategic gameplay and endless possibilities, Terra Dentium offers an immersive experience for both seasoned adventurers and newcomers alike. Dive into this epic journey and uncover the secrets of Terra Dentium!

Train and Evolve


Venture into the wild to battle a diverse array of creatures. Train your companions and watch them evolve into legendary forms, each with unique abilities and appearances.

Explore a Pixelated World

Experience a beautifully crafted pixel world with a modern twist on retro gaming aesthetics. Each pixel breathes life into the rich tapestry of environments you’ll explore.

Battle Mechanics

Engage in strategic turn-based battles that require foresight and planning. Each creature boasts unique skills that cater to a variety of battle styles.

Adventure and Discover

Unlock new areas by evolving your monsters, revealing hidden paths and even rarer creatures.

Fantasy Elements

Immerse yourself in a storyline that intertwines the destiny of your creatures with the fate of the world. Uncover ancient secrets and meet a cast of characters who will help or hinder your journey.

Retro Vibe, Modern Play

While Terra Dentium pays homage to the classics with its visual and thematic elements, it incorporates modern gameplay mechanics and storytelling to deliver a fresh, engaging experience.

Prepare to lose yourself in the nostalgic world of Terra Dentium, where your strategic skills will determine the fate of your creatures and the adventures you embark on. Are you ready to clash, capture, and create your legacy?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3xxx or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

This pixel-esque world invites you to explore vibrant, mysterious areas teeming with creatures to discover and capture. Dive into adventure, strategy, and endless possibilities in Terra Dentium!
